titles.title: Expressing support for designation of September 15, 2009, as "National Kids' Philanthropy Day".
Expressing support for designation of September 15, 2009, as "National Kids' Philanthropy Day".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Elementary, and Secondary Education.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Healthy Families and Communities.

committee.name: House Education and the Workforce
committee.subcommittee: Early Childhood, Elementary, and Secondary Education

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary:
Supports the designation of National Kids Philanthropy Day as a way to provide parents of cause-minded children with a significant way to recognize their efforts and spur them on to future acts of philanthropy and a lifetime of positive social change.
Supports the goals and ideals of Children's Hospital Boston's National Kids Philanthropy Day.
